data.actual_result: You need to scroll up manually to see it
data.expected_result: You should see immediately the latest pinned message
data.short_description: When you pin a message, opening the Pinned messages won't scroll up automatically to the newly pinned message. This applies only if you have already loaded the pinned messages in this channel before
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel with a lot of messages already pinned - Open Pinned messages - Close Pinned messages  - Have someone pin a new message - Re-open Pinned messages
